# Todo List

[![Watch the video]("https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/91437843/303905126-d67a330f-4d5a-4701-96f9-35def1d5c75b.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ERGGg2ZMbIr5scbMRk5MF4qnwSTxfVCv3Wti6wdLavc")](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c7AlIUf80Ug)

## Introduction

When learning Next.jsâ€™s Server Actions feature, I thought I could build a to-do list with this.

## Language and Tools

### FrontEnd

- TypeScript
- React.js
- Next.js (Server Actions)
- tailwind

### Backend

- JSON server

## How to run on your local

1. copy and paste the following in your desired route.

```jsx
git clone https://github.com/GenuineLukas/todo-list.git
```

2. run npm install

```jsx
npm install
```

3. try npm run dev (make sure your next.js version is higher than 18.7.0)

```jsx
npm run dev
```

4. run json-server on your 3001 port
```
json-server --watch db.json --port 3001
```
